Posts.Content: heather0621 wrote: (Pictures removed my moderators, per community guidelines I'm 28yrs old and I started off with a red bump about a couple weeks ago and and it has been getting bigger within days the first pic was last night and the second pic was today. I went to the local state care and they said they think it's an infection but the spot does not hurt. They gave me an antibiotic ointment and I have out it on twice and it just seems to be getting larger. I have a follow up appointment with my obgyn on Aug 2nd I also have a lump on the other side of my breast and my nipple has kind of changed some. I know you ladies cannot diagnose but I'm just wondering if this is something I should be worried about Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about ibc heather0621 MonaBegonia
